channel.title: Hyperfocus Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates for Hyperfocus.

item.title: Version 0.10.0
item.description:
Universal Leaderboard + User Profiles

  • New leaderboard showing all beta testers
  • Time-based filtering: Today, This Week, This Month
  • Add profile pictures and "Working on" bio
  • Editable profile from your leaderboard card
  • Renamed Friends tab to Leaderboard
